name: Yinra Emberwind

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: Yinra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
text: Yinra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

description: Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 223
